shaders.title: 3D Ray March
shaders.description: Ray-marched 3D scene with sphere on a plane, soft shadows, ambient occlusion, and specular lighting.
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Atmospheric Sunset
shaders.description: Rayleigh scattering simulation with sun disk, orange/pink/purple sky
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Audio Waveform
shaders.description: Simulated oscilloscope with glowing neon green line pulsing with procedural audio on a dark grid
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Aurora Borealis
shaders.description: Flowing curtains of green, purple, and blue light undulating like the northern lights
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Black Hole
shaders.description: Gravitational lensing of a procedural star field. Schwarzschild metric approximation bending light rays. Accretion disk with Doppler shifting. Dark event horizon sphere.
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Black Hole Lens
shaders.description: Gravitational lensing of a starfield with accretion disk, Einstein ring, and light bending
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Brick Wall
shaders.description: Offset rectangular grid with mortar and per-brick color variation
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Brushed Metal
shaders.description: Anisotropic specular highlight elongated along brush direction on a steel-gray surface
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Bubbles
shaders.description: Floating spheres with thin-film iridescence and refraction
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Butterfly Wings
shaders.description: Symmetric wing pattern with scale microstructure
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: CRT Monitor
shaders.description: Scanlines, barrel distortion, phosphor RGB subpixels, screen curvature, and slight color bleeding over animated content
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Calm Pool
shaders.description: Gentle concentric ripples on reflective water surface
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Camouflage
shaders.description: Smoothstepped noise in army green, brown, and tan tones
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Candle Flame
shaders.description: Single gentle flame with flicker, blue core, orange mantle
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Candy Swirl
shaders.description: Taffy-pull swirling two saturated colors together
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Carbon Fiber
shaders.description: Woven 2x2 twill with glossy resin
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Caustics
shaders.description: Dancing underwater light patterns from surface refraction
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Cell Division
shaders.description: Mitosis animation with nucleus splitting
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Celtic Knot
shaders.description: Over-under interlocking knot pattern with depth shading. Continuous band weaving over and under itself. Gold color on dark green.
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Ceramic Glaze
shaders.description: Smooth glossy surface with color pooling
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Chain Mail
shaders.description: Interlocking metal rings with 3D shading
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Chevron Pulse
shaders.description: Animated chevron arrows pulsing like a conveyor
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Circuit Board
shaders.description: PCB traces vias solder pads green mask
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Cloth Simulation
shaders.description: Silk fabric sheet with wave-like ripples, folds, and specular highlights showing depth
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Concentric Rings
shaders.description: Expanding rings from center with interference patterns
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Coral Reef
shaders.description: Branching coral with subsurface scattering effect
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Curl Noise
shaders.description: Divergence-free field visualized as flowing streamlines
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: DLA Growth
shaders.description: Diffusion-limited aggregation creating snowflake/crystal structures. Branching fractal growth from center. White crystal on dark blue.
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: DNA Helix
shaders.description: Double helix rotation with base-pair rungs
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Deep Ocean Gradient
shaders.description: Depth color shift from turquoise to abyssal dark blue with caustics
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Delaunay Lines
shaders.description: Triangulation wireframe over moving points
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Diamond Facets
shaders.description: Brilliant-cut gem with internal refraction and spectral dispersion. Multiple internal bounces creating fire effect. Rotating slowly.
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Dissolve Transition
shaders.description: Noise-threshold dissolve cycling between two colors with glowing edge at the dissolve boundary
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Dissolve to Embers
shaders.description: Content burns away from an animated point with noise-based dissolve, glowing orange edge, and rising ember particles
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Dot Matrix
shaders.description: LED display dot grid with scrolling content
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Dripping Paint
shaders.description: Thick viscous drips running down with gravity
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Droste Effect
shaders.description: Recursive image-within-image spiral. A pattern containing a smaller version of itself, zooming infinitely inward.
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Duotone Wash
shaders.description: Two-color gradient with animated noise boundary
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Dynamic Island Morph
shaders.description: Two shapes that stretch, merge, and separate with elastic liquid bridging in Apple Dynamic Island style
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Electric Arc
shaders.description: Tesla coil arcs between two points with branching
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Electric Arc
shaders.description: Jagged lightning bolts arcing between orbiting points with branching and blue electric glow
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Elementary CA
shaders.description: Wolfram Rule 30/90/110 scrolling
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Epidemic Model
shaders.description: SIR model infection spreading
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Escher Tessellation
shaders.description: Interlocking shapes tessellating from a deformed grid. Alternating colors reveal the interlocking pattern.
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Explosion
shaders.description: Expanding fireball with shockwave ring and smoke
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Fabric Weave
shaders.description: Cross-hatch woven pattern with per-thread noise variation
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Falling Sand
shaders.description: Gravity-driven colored sand piling up with hash-based cellular automaton approximation and layered colors
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Feather Barbs
shaders.description: Branching barb structure with iridescence
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Ferrofluid
shaders.description: Black spiky liquid forming sharp peaks toward an orbiting magnet with dark metallic reflections
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Film Grain
shaders.description: Animated photographic film grain overlay with adjustable intensity and warmth
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Fingerprint
shaders.description: Whorl and loop ridge patterns procedurally generated
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Flocking Boids
shaders.description: Emergent bird-flock behavior
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Flower Bloom
shaders.description: Petal spiral unfolding with golden angle phyllotaxis
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Fluid Advection
shaders.description: Simplified velocity field advecting color patterns. Curl noise velocity field carrying pigment. Smooth, organic flow.
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Fluid Simulation
shaders.description: Colorful swirling fluid with curl noise advection and multiple color streams mixing and flowing
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Forest Fire
shaders.description: Probabilistic fire spread through forest grid
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Fractal Noise
shaders.description: Layered fractal Brownian motion noise with animated color mapping
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Frost Crystallization
shaders.description: Ice crystals growing outward from seed points with fractal branching patterns, Voronoi-based crystal facets with blue-white coloring

shaders.title: Frosted Glass
shaders.description: Blurred icy surface with crystalline structure and refraction

shaders.title: Galaxy Spiral
shaders.description: Rotating spiral arms with star density variation, dust lanes, embedded bright stars, and core glow
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Game of Life
shaders.description: Conway's cellular automaton with gliders and emergent patterns from random initial state
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Geometric Bloom
shaders.description: Expanding geometric shapes radiating from center
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Gradient Orb
shaders.description: Single luminous sphere with radial falloff floating in dark space
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Granite Speckle
shaders.description: Multifrequency noise creating flecked stone texture
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Gravity N-Body
shaders.description: Multiple masses orbiting with trajectory trails
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Guilloche
shaders.description: Fine-line security pattern engraving
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Halftone CMYK
shaders.description: Color separation into rotated dot screens over an animated gradient with each CMYK layer at different rotation angles
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Heartbeat
shaders.description: Pulsing heart shape with ECG trace line
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Heat Diffusion
shaders.description: Temperature spreading from hot spots
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Herringbone
shaders.description: Zigzag brick alternating direction tiles
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Hexagonal Grid
shaders.description: Honeycomb cells with per-cell pulse animation, edge highlighting, and color waves propagating across the grid

shaders.description: Tilted holographic card effect with rainbow diffraction grating

shaders.title: Houndstooth
shaders.description: Classic two-tone fashion pattern with animated color shift

shaders.title: Ice Crystals
shaders.description: Branching crystalline frost using angular Worley noise
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Ink Watercolor
shaders.description: Ink drops spreading organically across paper with capillary action and color bleeding at edges
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Ink in Water
shaders.description: Diffusing ink cloud with tendrils spreading through liquid

shaders.description: Thin-film interference with soap bubble hue shifts based on surface angle

shaders.description: 8-fold interlocking star tessellation with animated line drawing. Precise geometric construction with golden ratio proportions.

shaders.title: Julia Set
shaders.description: Animated Julia fractal where c parameter orbits a circle, morphing the fractal continuously

shaders.title: Langtons Ant
shaders.description: Turing machine producing emergent highway

shaders.title: Lava Lamp
shaders.description: Thick blobs rising and falling with heat-driven convection coloring

shaders.title: Lava Magma
shaders.description: Hot-to-cool noise with slow flow distortion
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Leaf Veins
shaders.description: Branching venation pattern on a leaf shape

shaders.title: Leather Texture
shaders.description: Large bumps with fine pore detail for realistic leather

shaders.title: Lightning Bolt
shaders.description: Branching electric discharge with glow bloom and random re-strikes

shaders.description: Thousands of procedural particles attracted toward an orbiting point, creating swirling galaxy-like formations

shaders.description: Classic escape-time fractal with smooth continuous coloring and slow auto-zoom

shaders.description: Sinusoidal stone vein patterns with FBM distortion

shaders.description: Falling green katakana columns with varying speeds, brightness trails, and glow

shaders.title: Moire Circles
shaders.description: Two overlapping sets of concentric circles creating interference

shaders.title: Morphing Blobs
shaders.description: Soft metaball gradients drifting and merging organically

shaders.description: Expanding spore cloud with Brownian drift

shaders.title: Neon Glow Wash
shaders.description: Broad diffuse neon color bands pulsing and shifting

shaders.title: Neon Light Painting
shaders.description: Glowing neon trails drawing patterns over time with bloom and slow fade in multiple colors

shaders.description: Glowing neon tube letters with flicker, glass tube, and halo light bleed on a dark wall

shaders.description: Interconnected nodes with traveling signal pulses

shaders.title: Ocean Surface
shaders.description: Gerstner wave ocean with Fresnel reflections, sun specular, and foam highlights

shaders.title: Oil Slick
shaders.description: Thin oil on dark water with rainbow interference

shaders.description: Thin-film interference rainbow on dark water with swirling thickness variation and shifting colors

shaders.title: Op Art Waves
shaders.description: Bridget Riley-style undulating black and white stripes creating depth and motion illusion

shaders.title: Particle Swarm
shaders.description: Points orbiting attractors with trailing paths

shaders.title: Pendulum Phase
shaders.description: Double pendulum with phase-space trajectory

shaders.title: Penrose Tiling
shaders.description: Aperiodic kite-and-dart tiling with color cycling

shaders.title: Perlin Noise
shaders.description: Classic gradient noise with smooth animated movement
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: Planet Surface
shaders.description: Procedural terrain on a sphere — continents, oceans, clouds, atmosphere glow. Slowly rotating.

shaders.title: Plasma Wave
shaders.description: Classic plasma effect using sine wave interference patterns

shaders.description: Rainbow diffraction grating that shifts with viewing angle, with noise-distorted holographic patterns

shaders.description: Dots on grid with phase-offset scale pulsing

shaders.description: Splattered paint trajectories building up layered drip painting. Multiple colors with drip physics.

shaders.description: White light entering a triangular prism and splitting into a rainbow spectrum with chromatic dispersion

shaders.title: Prismatic Light
shaders.description: White light refracting through prism into clean rainbow spectrum

shaders.description: Still water reflection with distortion

shaders.title: Rain on Glass

shaders.title: Ridged Noise
shaders.description: Inverted absolute noise summed for mountain ridge patterns

shaders.title: Rust Corrosion
shaders.description: Multi-layered noise with hard thresholds for patchy oxidation
shaders.author: Jared Davidson

shaders.title: SDF Primitives
shaders.description: Gallery of signed distance field shapes — circle, box, star, heart — with smooth blending

shaders.description: Falling sand with piling physics

shaders.description: Logarithmic spiral with growth ridges and nacre sheen

shaders.title: Silk Flow
shaders.description: Anisotropic flowing fabric with specular highlights along thread direction

shaders.title: Simplex Noise
shaders.description: Improved noise with fewer directional artifacts

shaders.description: Multi-layer parallax snowflakes at different depths with gentle wind sway and atmospheric perspective

shaders.description: Swirling thin-film interference on membrane

shaders.description: Radial and spiral threads with glistening dew drops

shaders.description: Multi-depth star layers with twinkling, slow drift, and parallax depth

shaders.description: Lorenz attractor trajectory rendered as glowing density. Camera slowly orbits. Bright core trails with dim outer paths.

shaders.description: 80s retro sun with horizontal bands sinking behind a glowing perspective grid

shaders.title: Thermal Heatmap
shaders.description: Animated thermal camera palette with organic blobs

shaders.description: Ocean surface with large directional waves, foam on crests, deep troughs, and dramatic lighting

shaders.title: Tiled Mirrors

shaders.description: Concentric ripples emanating from animated points, distorting a colored background with realistic water caustics

shaders.description: Rim-lit soft material bright at grazing angles
